system.description:
Your psionic talents and martial skill have begun to feed into one another, allowing you to perform feats that either discipline could not do on its own. You gain the following benefits:

  • When you lose a psi die, you regain a point of exertion.
  • You gain proficiency with the Awakened Mind combat tradition or another combat tradition of your choice if you are already proficient. You learn an Awakened Mind maneuver of a level you could learn. It does not count against your maneuvers known.
  • Half your esper levels count as fighter levels for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.7vvqy990w8pxatdy]{Indomitable} feature.
  • Half your fighter levels count as esper levels for the purpose of the Intellect Fortress feature.
  • While you are psionically-focused, you gain an additional benefit based on your chosen discipline:
    • Empathic: your AC increases by 1 as you anticipate incoming attacks.
    • Kinesthetic: your speed increases by 10 feet.
    • Telepathic: a creature that scores a critical hit against you takes 2d6 points of psychic damage from psychic feedback and you have advantage on the subsequent save to avoid losing concentration. 
    • Telekinetic: you gain advantage on saves to avoid taking damage from terrain-based effects.
